note: After artifact system implementation - hardened hybrid solution

schema.name: approvals
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `approvals` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `approval_type` varchar(255) null default null, `status` varchar(255) null default 'pending', `requested_by` char(36) null default null, `approver` char(36) null default null, `approved_by` char(36) null default null, `related_collection` varchar(255) null default null, `related_id` char(36) null default null, `requested_at` datetime null default null, `responded_at` datetime null default null, `due_date` datetime null default null, `request_message` text null default null, `response_message` text null default null, `before_data` json null default null, `after_data` json null default null, `auto_approve_rule` varchar(255) null default null)

meta.note: Audit log of artifact approval/rejection actions

schema.name: artifact_approvals
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "artifact_approvals" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `artifact_version_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `project_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `task_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `action` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `actor_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `actor_type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'human', `reason` text NULL DEFAULT null, `feedback` json NULL DEFAULT null, `notes` text NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `artifact_approvals_artifact_version_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`artifact_version_id`) REFERENCES `artifact_versions` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `artifact_approvals_project_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`project_id`) REFERENCES `projects` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `artifact_approvals_task_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`task_id`) REFERENCES `tasks` (`id`))

meta.note: Version registry for all task artifacts (files + structured data)

schema.name: artifact_versions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "artifact_versions" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `project_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `schema_key` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'pending', `value` json NULL DEFAULT null, `file_ids` json NULL DEFAULT null, `source_task_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `execution_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `version_number` integer NULL DEFAULT '1', `approved_at` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `approved_by` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `rejection_reason` text NULL DEFAULT null, `metadata` json NULL DEFAULT null, `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `artifact_versions_project_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`project_id`) REFERENCES `projects` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `artifact_versions_source_task_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`source_task_id`) REFERENCES `tasks` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `artifact_versions_execution_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`execution_id`) REFERENCES `task_executions` (`id`))

schema.name: clients
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "clients" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `last_name` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `email` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `phone` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `company_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'active', `avatar` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `linkedin` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `notes` text NULL DEFAULT null, `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `clients_company_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`company_id`) REFERENCES `companies` (`id`))

schema.name: companies
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `companies` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `name` varchar(255) null default null, `slug` varchar(255) null default null, `legal_name` varchar(255) null default null, `type` varchar(255) null default null, `industry` varchar(255) null default null, `website` varchar(255) null default null, `email` varchar(255) null default null, `phone` varchar(255) null default null, `address` text null default null, `city` varchar(255) null default null, `state` varchar(255) null default null, `postal_code` varchar(255) null default null, `country` varchar(255) null default null, `employee_count` integer null default null, `annual_revenue` float null default null, `logo` char(36) null default null, `status` varchar(255) null default 'active', `notes` text null default null, `tags` json null default null)

schema.name: documents
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "documents" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `description` text NULL DEFAULT null, `file_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `category` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `project_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `company_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `version` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `created_by_ai` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `notes` text NULL DEFAULT null, `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, `artifact_version_id` char(36) NULL, CONSTRAINT `documents_company_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`company_id`) REFERENCES `companies` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `documents_artifact_version_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`artifact_version_id`) REFERENCES `artifact_versions` (`id`))

schema.name: file_attachments
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `file_attachments` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `file_id` char(36) null default null, `parent_collection` varchar(255) null default null, `parent_id` char(36) null default null, `field_name` varchar(255) null default null, `role` varchar(255) null default 'attachment', `display_order` integer null default '0', `is_primary` boolean null default '0', `uploaded_by_ai` boolean null default '0', `description` text null default null, `tags` json null default null)

meta.note: Background jobs and AI automation tracking

schema.name: jobs
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "jobs" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `job_id` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'pending', `progress_percent` integer NULL DEFAULT '0', `task_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `project_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `template_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `started_at` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `completed_at` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `last_heartbeat` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `retry_count` integer NULL DEFAULT '0', `max_retries` integer NULL DEFAULT '3', `input_payload` json NULL DEFAULT null, `output_payload` json NULL DEFAULT null, `error_message` text NULL DEFAULT null, `logs` json NULL DEFAULT null, `callback_url` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `external_job_id` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `priority` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'normal', `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `jobs_task_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`task_id`) REFERENCES `tasks` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `jobs_template_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`template_id`) REFERENCES `template_versions` (`id`))

schema.name: opportunities
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "opportunities" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `company_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `client_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `value` float NULL DEFAULT null, `stage` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'lead', `probability` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `expected_close_date` date NULL DEFAULT null, `actual_close_date` date NULL DEFAULT null, `description` text NULL DEFAULT null, `notes` text NULL DEFAULT null, `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `opportunities_company_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`company_id`) REFERENCES `companies` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `opportunities_client_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`client_id`) REFERENCES `clients` (`id`))

meta.note: Work projects - all work lives inside projects

schema.name: projects
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "projects" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `description` text NULL DEFAULT null, `company_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `opportunity_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `lifecycle_status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `template_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `template_version` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `start_date` date NULL DEFAULT null, `due_date` date NULL DEFAULT null, `completed_date` date NULL DEFAULT null, `budget` float NULL DEFAULT null, `priority` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'medium', `notes` text NULL DEFAULT null, `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, `context` json null default '{}', `context_version` integer null default '0', CONSTRAINT `projects_company_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`company_id`) REFERENCES `companies` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `projects_opportunity_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`opportunity_id`) REFERENCES `opportunities` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `projects_template_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`template_id`) REFERENCES `template_versions` (`id`))

schema.name: task_dependencies
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "task_dependencies" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `task_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `depends_on_task_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `dependency_type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'finish_to_start', `lag_time_hours` integer NULL DEFAULT '0', `is_blocking` boolean NULL DEFAULT '1', `notes` text NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `task_dependencies_task_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`task_id`) REFERENCES `tasks` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `task_dependencies_depends_on_task_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`depends_on_task_id`) REFERENCES `tasks` (`id`))

meta.note: AI task execution tracking with quality metrics and SLA

schema.name: task_executions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "task_executions" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `task_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `job_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `execution_type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `template_version` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `started_at` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `completed_at` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `duration_seconds` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `sla_target_seconds` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `met_sla` boolean NULL DEFAULT null, `accuracy_band` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `acceptance_status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'pending', `correction_count` integer NULL DEFAULT '0', `corrections` json NULL DEFAULT null, `checker_user_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `escalated` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `escalation_reason` text NULL DEFAULT null, `automation_percentage` float NULL DEFAULT null, `cost_usd` float NULL DEFAULT null, `tokens_used` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `model_used` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `feedback_score` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `feedback_text` text NULL DEFAULT null, `training_data` boolean NULL DEFAULT '1', `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `task_executions_task_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`task_id`) REFERENCES `tasks` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `task_executions_job_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`job_id`) REFERENCES `jobs` (`id`))

meta.note: Tasks - work items with AI/human execution tracking

schema.name: tasks
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "tasks" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `description` text NULL DEFAULT null, `project_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'new', `assigned_to` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `execution_type` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'human', `due_date` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `sla_minutes` integer NULL DEFAULT null, `priority` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'medium', `output` text NULL DEFAULT null, `notes` text NULL DEFAULT null, `tags` json NULL DEFAULT null, `artifact_version_ids` json null)

schema.name: template_versions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "template_versions" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `template_id` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `version_number` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, `status` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT 'draft', `is_latest` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `published_at` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `published_by` char(36) NULL DEFAULT null, `deprecated_at` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `changelog` text NULL DEFAULT null, `breaking_changes` boolean NULL DEFAULT '0', `template_definition` json NULL DEFAULT null, `pre_seeded_tasks` json NULL DEFAULT null, `database_schemas` json NULL DEFAULT null, `automation_hooks` json NULL DEFAULT null, `form_inputs` json NULL DEFAULT null, `usage_count` integer NULL DEFAULT '0', `min_client_version` varchar(255) NULL DEFAULT null, CONSTRAINT `template_versions_template_id_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`template_id`) REFERENCES `templates` (`id`))

meta.note: Project templates - parent collection for versioned workflows

schema.name: templates
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `templates` (`id` integer not null primary key autoincrement, `name` varchar(255) null default null, `slug` varchar(255) null default null, `description` text null default null, `category` varchar(255) null default null, `icon` varchar(255) null default null, `status` varchar(255) null default 'draft', `owner_id` char(36) null default null, `is_public` boolean null default '0', `usage_count` integer null default '0', `notes` text null default null, `tags` json null default null)

schema.name: directus_access
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_access` (`id` char(36), `role` char(36) null, `user` char(36) null, `policy` char(36) not null, `sort` integer, foreign key(`role`) references `directus_roles`(`id`) on delete CASCADE, foreign key(`user`) references `directus_users`(`id`) on delete CASCADE, foreign key(`policy`) references `directus_policies`(`id`) on delete CASCADE, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_activity
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_activity" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `action` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `user` char(36), `timestamp` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `ip` varchar(50), `user_agent` text, `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `origin` varchar(255) NULL)

schema.name: directus_collections
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_collections" (`collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `icon` varchar(64), `note` text, `display_template` varchar(255), `hidden` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `singleton` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `translations` json, `archive_field` varchar(64), `archive_app_filter` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `archive_value` varchar(255), `unarchive_value` varchar(255), `sort_field` varchar(64), `accountability` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'all', `color` varchar(255) NULL, `item_duplication_fields` json NULL, `sort` integer, `group` varchar(64), `collapse` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'open', `preview_url` varchar(255) NULL, `versioning` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`collection`), FOREIGN KEY (`group`) REFERENCES `directus_collections` (`collection`))

schema.name: directus_comments
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_comments" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `comment` text NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date_updated` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), `user_updated` char(36), FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`user_updated`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_fields
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_fields" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `field` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `special` varchar(64), `interface` varchar(64), `options` json, `display` varchar(64), `display_options` json, `readonly` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `hidden` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `sort` integer, `width` varchar(30) DEFAULT 'full', `translations` json, `note` text, `conditions` json, `required` boolean DEFAULT '0', `group` varchar(64), `validation` json, `validation_message` text)

schema.name: directus_files
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_files" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `storage` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `filename_disk` varchar(255), `filename_download` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(255), `type` varchar(255), `folder` char(36), `uploaded_by` char(36), "created_on" datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `modified_by` char(36), `modified_on` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `charset` varchar(50), `filesize` bigint DEFAULT null, `width` integer, `height` integer, `duration` integer, `embed` varchar(200), `description` text, `location` text, `tags` text, `metadata` json, `focal_point_x` integer null, `focal_point_y` integer null, `tus_id` varchar(64) null, `tus_data` json null, `uploaded_on` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`uploaded_by`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`modified_by`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`folder`) REFERENCES `directus_folders` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: directus_folders
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_folders" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `parent` char(36), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`parent`) REFERENCES `directus_folders` (`id`))

schema.name: directus_migrations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_migrations` (`version` varchar(255) not null, `name` varchar(255) not null, `timestamp` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, primary key (`version`))

schema.name: directus_permissions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_permissions" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `action` varchar(10) NOT NULL, `permissions` json, `validation` json, `presets` json, `fields` text, `policy` char(36) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`policy`) REFERENCES `directus_policies` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_policies
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_policies` (`id` char(36), `name` varchar(100) not null, `icon` varchar(64) not null default 'badge', `description` text, `ip_access` text, `enforce_tfa` boolean not null default '0', `admin_access` boolean not null default '0', `app_access` boolean not null default '0', primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_presets
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_presets" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `bookmark` varchar(255), `user` char(36), `role` char(36), `collection` varchar(64), `search` varchar(100), `layout` varchar(100) DEFAULT 'tabular', `layout_query` json, `layout_options` json, `refresh_interval` integer, `filter` json, `icon` varchar(64) DEFAULT 'bookmark', `color` varchar(255) NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`user`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_relations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_relations" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `many_collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `many_field` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `one_collection` varchar(64), `one_field` varchar(64), `one_collection_field` varchar(64), `one_allowed_collections` text, `junction_field` varchar(64), `sort_field` varchar(64), `one_deselect_action` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'nullify')

schema.name: directus_revisions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_revisions" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `activity` integer NOT NULL, `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `data` json, `delta` json, `parent` integer, `version` char(36), FOREIGN KEY (`parent`) REFERENCES `directus_revisions` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`activity`) REFERENCES `directus_activity` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`version`) REFERENCES `directus_versions` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_roles
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_roles" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `icon` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'supervised_user_circle', `description` text, `parent` char(36), PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`parent`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`))

schema.name: directus_sessions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_sessions" (`token` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `user` char(36), `expires` datetime NOT NULL, `ip` varchar(255), `user_agent` text, `share` char(36), `origin` varchar(255) NULL, `next_token` varchar(64) null, PRIMARY KEY (`token`), FOREIGN KEY (`user`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`share`) REFERENCES `directus_shares` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE)

schema.name: directus_settings
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_settings" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `project_name` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Directus', `project_url` varchar(255), `project_color` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '#6644FF', `project_logo` char(36), `public_foreground` char(36), `public_background` char(36), `public_note` text, `auth_login_attempts` integer DEFAULT '25', `auth_password_policy` varchar(100), `storage_asset_transform` varchar(7) DEFAULT 'all', `storage_asset_presets` json, `custom_css` text, `storage_default_folder` char(36), `basemaps` json, `mapbox_key` varchar(255), `module_bar` json, `project_descriptor` varchar(100) NULL, `default_language` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'en-US', `custom_aspect_ratios` json, `public_favicon` char(36), `default_appearance` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'auto', `default_theme_light` varchar(255), `theme_light_overrides` json, `default_theme_dark` varchar(255), `theme_dark_overrides` json, `report_error_url` varchar(255) NULL, `report_bug_url` varchar(255) NULL, `report_feature_url` varchar(255) NULL, `public_registration` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `public_registration_verify_email` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `public_registration_role` char(36) NULL, `public_registration_email_filter` json NULL, `visual_editor_urls` json null, `accepted_terms` boolean default '0', `project_id` char(36), `mcp_enabled` boolean not null default '0', `mcp_allow_deletes` boolean not null default '0', `mcp_prompts_collection` varchar(255) null default null, `mcp_system_prompt_enabled` boolean not null default '1', `mcp_system_prompt` text null default null, FOREIGN KEY (`project_logo`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`public_foreground`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`public_background`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `directus_settings_storage_default_folder_foreign` FOREIGN KEY (`storage_default_folder`) REFERENCES `directus_folders` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`public_favicon`) REFERENCES `directus_files` (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`public_registration_role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: directus_users
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_users" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `first_name` varchar(50), `last_name` varchar(50), `email` varchar(128), `password` varchar(255), `location` varchar(255), `title` varchar(50), `description` text, `tags` json, `avatar` char(36), `language` varchar(255) DEFAULT null, `tfa_secret` varchar(255), `status` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active', `role` char(36), `token` varchar(255), `last_access` datetime, `last_page` varchar(255), `provider` varchar(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default', `external_identifier` varchar(255), `auth_data` json, `email_notifications` boolean DEFAULT '1', `appearance` varchar(255), `theme_dark` varchar(255), `theme_light` varchar(255), `theme_light_overrides` json, `theme_dark_overrides` json, `text_direction` varchar(255) not null default 'auto', PRIMARY KEY (`id`), FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: directus_webhooks
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_webhooks" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `method` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'POST', `url` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active', `data` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `actions` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `collections` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `headers` json, `was_active_before_deprecation` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `migrated_flow` char(36) NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`migrated_flow`) REFERENCES `directus_flows` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL)

schema.name: directus_dashboards
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_dashboards" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `icon` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'dashboard', `note` text, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), `color` varchar(255) NULL, FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_panels
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_panels" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `dashboard` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255), `icon` varchar(64) DEFAULT null, `color` varchar(10), `show_header` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `note` text, `type` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `position_x` integer NOT NULL, `position_y` integer NOT NULL, `width` integer NOT NULL, `height` integer NOT NULL, `options` json, `date_created` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), FOREIGN KEY (`dashboard`) REFERENCES `directus_dashboards` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_notifications
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_notifications" (`id` integer PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `timestamp` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `status` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'inbox', `recipient` char(36) NOT NULL, `sender` char(36), `subject` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `message` text, `collection` varchar(64), `item` varchar(255), FOREIGN KEY (`recipient`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`sender`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`))

schema.name: directus_shares
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_shares" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255), `collection` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `item` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `role` char(36), `password` varchar(255), `user_created` char(36), `date_created` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date_start` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `date_end` datetime NULL DEFAULT null, `times_used` integer DEFAULT '0', `max_uses` integer, FOREIGN KEY (`collection`) REFERENCES `directus_collections` (`collection`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`role`) REFERENCES `directus_roles` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_flows
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_flows" (`id` char(36) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `icon` varchar(64), `color` varchar(255) NULL, `description` text, `status` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'active', `trigger` varchar(255), `accountability` varchar(255) DEFAULT 'all', `options` json, `operation` char(36), `date_created` datetime DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), FOREIGN KEY (`user_created`) REFERENCES `directus_users` (`id`) ON DELETE SET NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

schema.name: directus_operations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_operations` (`id` char(36) not null, `name` varchar(255), `key` varchar(255) not null, `type` varchar(255) not null, `position_x` integer not null, `position_y` integer not null, `options` json, `resolve` char(36), `reject` char(36), `flow` char(36) not null, `date_created` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), foreign key(`resolve`) references `directus_operations`(`id`), foreign key(`reject`) references `directus_operations`(`id`), foreign key(`flow`) references `directus_flows`(`id`) on delete CASCADE, foreign key(`user_created`) references `directus_users`(`id`) on delete SET NULL, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_translations
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_translations` (`id` char(36) not null, `language` varchar(255) not null, `key` varchar(255) not null, `value` text not null, primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_versions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE `directus_versions` (`id` char(36) not null, `key` varchar(64) not null, `name` varchar(255), `collection` varchar(64) not null, `item` varchar(255) not null, `hash` varchar(255), `date_created` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `date_updated` datetime default CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, `user_created` char(36), `user_updated` char(36), `delta` json, foreign key(`collection`) references `directus_collections`(`collection`) on delete CASCADE, foreign key(`user_created`) references `directus_users`(`id`) on delete SET NULL, foreign key(`user_updated`) references `directus_users`(`id`), primary key (`id`))

schema.name: directus_extensions
schema.sql: CREATE TABLE "directus_extensions" (`enabled` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT '1', `id` char(36) NOT NULL, `folder` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `source` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `bundle` char(36), PRIMARY KEY (`id`))

meta.note: Specific field this attaches to (for db_cell mode)
User who requested approval (links to directus_users)
User assigned to approve (links to directus_users)
User who actually approved/rejected (links to directus_users)
Approver's feedback or reason for decision
Prerequisite task that must complete first (links to os_tasks)
Whether this dependency blocks task start
Array of corrections with field, old value, new value
User who reviewed/checked output (links to directus_users)
Whether this was escalated to human
AI API cost for this execution
Use this execution for model fine-tuning
Array of artifact_version IDs created by this task
Template used for this job (links to os_project_templates)
External system job reference (e.g., n8n execution ID)
Project knowledge base - accumulated approved artifacts (cache)
Optimistic locking version for context updates
Whether template is available to all users
Total projects created from this template
Whether this version has breaking changes
Default tasks created with this template
User input fields during project creation
Number of projects using this version
Dot-notation path in project.context (e.g., brand.logo, deliverables.business_card)
Array of directus_files UUIDs (for multi-file artifacts)
Task that generated this artifact (links to tasks)
Why this version was rejected (learning data)
Additional metadata (dimensions, format, AI model used, etc.)
Artifact version being approved/rejected (links to artifact_versions)
Task that generated this artifact (links to tasks)
User who performed action (links to directus_users)
Reason for approval/rejection (learning data for AI)
